name: crewjah
description: Educational platform for students and lifelong learners

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd fastapi_backend && uvicorn main:app --reload"
scripts.dev-node: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.dev-flask: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd flask_backend && python app.py"

author: Crewjah Team
